text: In a vendor-led network modernization in edtech where operations needs ROI clarity and executives demand evidence, what should the project manager do to evaluate delivery options to demonstrate value?

options.label: compare delivery phasing and increments against value realization
select the fastest option without value analysis
ignore stakeholder input on options
choose the most complex option to impress

explanation: Option a is correct because phasing should maximize value. Option b is incorrect because speed alone may not deliver value. Option c is incorrect because lack of input risks misalignment. Option d is incorrect because complexity without value is waste.
